channel.title: How do I change drop chances of items
channel.description: I am asking this because when i added a amulet of fury to the hill giants drop table it dropped it about 50% of the time. When i added the fury to the drop table i put the id on the bottom row. Isn't that supposed to make it a rare drop?

item.title: How do I change drop chances of items
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

No, it should be set up something similar like:

npcID, itemDropped, itemDropChance, itemDropAmount

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change drop chances of items
